amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide framework to close the detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, by December 1, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to provide framework to close the detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, by December 1, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 249 (Roll no. 237).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 249 (Roll no. 237).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
